person.persName: John Buckner Lendrum (Covington, Ky, justice of the peace, mayor pro tem, and bookkeeper)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, city clerk, bookkeeper, and politician. Virginia native. Son of Thomas Keith Lendrum and Margaret Stokes Lendrum. Married to Elizabeth Lendrum. Father of Thomas W. Lendrum, Harry S. Lendrum, and Lillie H. Lendrum. City clerk in Covington in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Kenton County in 1850. Bookkeeper in Covington in 1860. Employed Jane Blackburn and Frank Garrish as servants in 1860. Appointed mayor pro tem of Covington in 1862. Justice of the peace in Kenton County in 1863.
